questions.question: “An absolute level of income set by the government for each family size below which a family is deemed to be in poverty” is known as
Absolute poverty depends
options: On Income But Not On Access To Social Services
Not On Income But On Access To Social Services
On Income And On Access To Social Services
Neither On Income Nor On Access To Social Services
questions.correct: On Income And On Access To Social Services

questions.question: “The equipment and structures used to produce goods and services” is the definition of
“Above-equilibrium wages paid by firms to increase worker productivity” are known as
“Government policy aimed at protecting people against the risk of adverse events” is
“A difference in wages that arises to offset the non-monetary characteristics of different jobs” is known as
For a competitive and profit-maximising firm,
options: Each Factor’s Rental Price < The Value Of The Marginal Product For That Factor
Each Factor’s Rental Price = The Value Of The Marginal Product For That Factor
Each Factor’s Rental Price > The Value Of The Marginal Product For That Factor
Each Factor’s Rental Price = The Value Of The Average Product For That Factor
questions.correct: Each Factor’s Rental Price = The Value Of The Marginal Product For That Factor
